articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Uruguay knock Brazil out on penalties to move into Copa America semifinals - Hindustan Times
articles.description: For Brazil, it is a second straight quarter-final exit via penalties in a major tournament following their 2022 World Cup loss to Croatia. | Football News
articles.content: Uruguay edged Brazil 4-2 in a penalty shootout on Saturday after going down to 10 men in a bruising 0-0 draw at the Allegiant Stadium in Las Vegas to march into the semi-finals of the Copa America wh… [+3054 chars]

articles.title: Crosby celebrates with Canadian men’s soccer team after Copa America victory - NHL.com
articles.description: Nova Scotia native supports hometown soccer team
articles.content: The Canadians took a 1-0 lead in the 13th minute before Venezuela tied the game late. The game eventually went to penalty kicks where Canadians took the win to advance to the semi-finals. Then Crosby… [+293 chars]
